name: Spoops 2 Even Spoopier
description:
*Play with controller or keyboard*

This was made for a game a week class and the theme was a sequel. The first spoops is on my page. This is a follow up to Spoops, where now you take a more action oriented approach and shine your light on ghosts to kill them. However, this time the king of the ghosts has taken the fight to you. Can you take down the king or catch the even worse spoops?
